original_text: An unclean man might ride on an animal. The cloth on the back of the animal will become unclean.
korean_text: 유출병이 있는 자가 탔던 안장은 다 부정하며

sentences.original_text: An unclean man might ride on an animal
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 사람이 동물을 탈 수 있다

sentences.original_text: The cloth on the back of the animal
